article_text:
The California Nurses Association endorsed Bernie Sanders for president

The union paid for 30 Sanders billboards around the state

Nurses say his views align with their priorities

article_metadata.news-keywords: feel the bern, bernie, sanders, national nurses united, california nurses association, california, primary, presidential election, bernie for president, election
article_metadata.description: The California Nurses Association is campaigning for Bernie Sanders ahead of the June primary.
article_metadata.title: California nurses ‘feel the Bern’ | The Sacramento Bee
